Chioma Okereke bụ onye na-ede abụ, onye ode akwụkwọ na onye edemede nkenke akụkọ   Akwụkwọ akụkọ mpụta mbụ ya, Bitter Leaf (2010), ka edepụtara aha maka ihe nrite ndị ode akwụkwọ Commonwealth - Africa Best First Book 2011
A mụrụ Okereke na Benin City, Nigeria
Ọ kwagara Britain mgbe ọ dị afọ isii wee gaa ọtụtụ ụlọ akwụkwọ, tupu ọ gụchaa akwụkwọ nke isii ya na North London Collegiate School na Canons, Middlesex
Okereke gụchara nzere LLB na University College London
Dịka onye na-ede uri na onye edemede nkenke akụkọ nke rụrụ ọrụ na mba ụwa,  Okereke mere ka e bipụta ọrụ mbụ ya na Bum Rush The Page na Callaloo akwụkwọ akụkọ
Edepụtara aha ya maka asọmpi ndị ode akwụkwọ a na-achọpụtabeghi n'afọ 2006, ya na maka Daily Telegraph 's Write a Novel in a Year Competition 2007
Ebiputara akwụkwọ akụkọ mpụta ya bụ Bitter Leaf n'afọ 2010 site na Virago Press  wee depụta aha ya maka ihe nrite Commonwealth Writers' - Africa Best First Book 2011
Nkenke akụkọ ya "Trompette de la Mort" bụ nke mbụ gbagoro maka mmeri mbụ Costa Short Story Award na 2012 Costa Book Awards na ọrụ ya gụnyere na Virago is 40 anthology (2013)
